mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(hct.assign_nid) AS total FROM ht_credit_tender hct

select SUM(hct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(hct.assign_account) AS sumAssignAccount, SUM(hct.assign_interest) AS sumAssignInterest, SUM(hct.assign_price) AS sumAssignPrice, SUM(hct.assign_pay) AS sumAssignPay, SUM(hct.assign_repay_account) AS sumAssignRepayAccount, SUM((select sum(manage_fee) from ht_credit_repay where assign_nid= hct.assign_nid)) AS sumCreditFee FROM ht_credit_tender hct

SELECT hbi.borrow_nid as borrowNid, hbi.name as borrowName, hb.borrow_style as borrowStyle, cr.recover_period as recoverPeriod, cr.assign_capital as assignCapital, cr.assign_interest as assignInterest, cr.assign_account as assignAccount, cr.manage_fee as manageFee, cr.status, CASE WHEN cr.assign_repay_next_time > 0 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( cr.assign_repay_next_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END as assignRepayNextTime FROM ht_credit_repay cr LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi on hbi.borrow_nid = cr.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb on hb.borrow_nid = cr.bid_nid WHERE assign_nid = #{assignNid}
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select SUM(assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(assign_interest) AS sumAssigninterest, SUM(assign_account) AS sumAssignAccount, SUM(manage_fee) AS sumManageFee from ht_credit_repay
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid

SELECT ct.assign_nid AS assignNid, bc.client AS client, ct.credit_nid AS creditNid, ct.bid_nid AS bidNid, ct.credit_user_name AS creditUserName, ct.user_name AS userName, FORMAT(ct.assign_capital, 2) AS assignCapital, FORMAT(bc.credit_discount, 2) AS creditDiscount, FORMAT(ct.assign_capital, 2) AS assignCapitalPrice, FORMAT(ct.assign_price, 2) AS assignPrice, FORMAT(ct.assign_interest_advance, 2) AS assignInterestAdvance, FORMAT(ct.credit_fee, 2) AS creditFee, FORMAT(ct.assign_pay, 2) AS assignPay, ct.create_time AS addTime,
hta.status AS contractStatus, hta.contract_number AS contractNumber, ct.user_id as userId, ct.credit_tender_nid as creditTenderNid, hta.download_url AS downloadUrl, hta.viewpdf_url AS viewpdfUrl, hta.img_url AS imgUrl FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid LEFT JOIN ht_tender_agreement hta ON hta.tender_nid = ct.assign_nid
ORDER BY bc.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT SUM(ct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(ct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapitalPrice, SUM(ct.assign_price) AS sumAssignPrice, SUM(ct.assign_interest_advance) AS sumAssignInterestAdvance, SUM(ct.credit_fee) AS sumCreditFee, SUM(ct.assign_pay) AS sumAssignPay FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid

SELECT count(hct.assign_id) FROM ht_credit_tender hct
AND hct.credit_nid = #{creditNid}
